question: 「(A) I wake up. (B) I eat breakfast. (C) I go to school.」を正しい順番に並べると？
「(A) She opened the book. (B) She read it. (C) She closed it.」を正しい順番に並べると？
「(A) It started to rain. (B) We took out umbrellas. (C) We went home.」を正しい順番に並べると？
「(A) Tom cooked dinner. (B) We ate together. (C) We washed dishes.」を正しい順番に並べると？
「(A) She bought a ticket. (B) She got on the bus. (C) She arrived at work.」を正しい順番に並べると？
「(A) I turned on the TV. (B) I watched the news. (C) I turned it off.」を正しい順番に並べると？
「(A) They met at the cafe. (B) They talked for an hour. (C) They said goodbye.」を正しい順番に並べると？
「(A) I did my homework. (B) I played video games. (C) I went to bed.」を正しい順番に並べると？
「(A) She put on her coat. (B) She opened the door. (C) She went outside.」を正しい順番に並べると？
「(A) He studied hard. (B) He took the test. (C) He passed.」を正しい順番に並べると？
「(A) I put on my shoes. (B) I walked outside. (C) I ran to the park.」を正しい順番に並べると？
「(A) She turned on the computer. (B) She checked her email. (C) She typed a message.」を正しい順番に並べると？
「(A) He opened the fridge. (B) He took out milk. (C) He poured a glass.」を正しい順番に並べると？
「(A) We packed our bags. (B) We drove to the airport. (C) We boarded the plane.」を正しい順番に並べると？
「(A) The bell rang. (B) The students sat down. (C) The teacher started the lesson.」を正しい順番に並べると？
「(A) I brushed my teeth. (B) I washed my face. (C) I went to bed.」を正しい順番に並べると？
「(A) She lit the candles. (B) We sang happy birthday. (C) He blew them out.」を正しい順番に並べると？
「(A) The dog barked. (B) I opened the door. (C) It ran outside.」を正しい順番に並べると？
「(A) He finished his work. (B) He saved the file. (C) He shut down the computer.」を正しい順番に並べると？
「(A) They bought tickets. (B) They found their seats. (C) The show began.」を正しい順番に並べると？
